content:
Hello,

I am currently working on the PR #3452 (called feat: port RingTheory.Localization.Ideal) and have a timeout at line 203. Increasing the heartbeats solves the problem but I do not understand why there was a timeout in the first place. Could someone please explain it to me?
The rw [‚Üê RingHom.map_mul] towards the end seems to take about a minute here. I pushed an uglification that seems to help
Thank you! (I will refer properly to the PR next time.)
